docs.abstract: We asked experts which timepieces have shaped modern design. Here are their choices.
docs.snippet: We asked experts which timepieces have shaped modern design. Here are their choices.
docs.lead_paragraph: What does “contemporary design” mean in an industry that perennially looks backward?

headline.main: 10 Watches That Changed What’s on Your Wrist
headline.print_headline: 10 Watches that changed what’s on your wrist

docs.abstract: New-gadget season is almost here, but our columnist has concluded, after testing hundreds of gizmos over the years, that it pays to wait.
docs.snippet: New-gadget season is almost here, but our columnist has concluded, after testing hundreds of gizmos over the years, that it pays to wait.
docs.lead_paragraph: The best gadget that I bought this year cost less than a week’s worth of groceries. After my smartphone, it’s my most frequently used piece of tech. It was also released four years ago.

headline.main: The Joys of Being a Late Tech Adopter
headline.print_headline: The Joys of Being a Late Adopter

docs.abstract: The iPhone 11, Apple’s entry-level phone, will start at $700, compared with $750 for the comparable model last year.
docs.snippet: The iPhone 11, Apple’s entry-level phone, will start at $700, compared with $750 for the comparable model last year.
docs.lead_paragraph: CUPERTINO, Calif. — Apple’s product launches have long been full of surprises, but rarely has a price cut been among them.

headline.main: Apple’s iPhone 11 Has a New Feature: A Lower Price
headline.print_headline: Apple Product Launch Surprise: iPhone Price Cut

byline.original: By Brian X. Chen and Jack Nicas

docs.abstract: Apple, offering much less programming than streaming rivals, will court subscribers by emphasizing its quality.
docs.snippet: Apple, offering much less programming than streaming rivals, will court subscribers by emphasizing its quality.
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Cook went into full salesman mode at Apple’s promotional event on Tuesday as he revealed the price for a monthly subscription for its streaming service, Apple TV Plus.

headline.main: Apple TV Plus Is Just $5. Will People Pay for It?
headline.print_headline: Apple Will Stream for $5 a Month

docs.abstract: The company’s product launch pageant has become a parody. Time to call it quits.
docs.snippet: The company’s product launch pageant has become a parody. Time to call it quits.
docs.lead_paragraph: Roughly six minutes into Apple’s annual keynote presentation on Tuesday, I watched with grim fascination as a video game executive guided a digital frog across a bathroom floor in order to carefully avoid scraps of rogue toilet paper, while a second executive provided breathless color commentary.

docs.abstract: With the ‘Yellow Vest‘ movement widening the country’s budget shortfall, the French government is accelerating a plan to hit companies like Apple, Facebook and Google with a big bill.
docs.snippet: With the ‘Yellow Vest‘ movement widening the country’s budget shortfall, the French government is accelerating a plan to hit companies like Apple, Facebook and Google with a big bill.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS — With the so-called Yellow Vest movement forcing concessions that have widened the country’s budget shortfall, the French government is accelerating a plan to place hefty taxes on American technology giants that have long maneuvered to keep their bills low while reaping huge sums of money.

headline.main: France, Not Waiting for European Union, to Tax U.S. Tech Firms as ’19 Starts
headline.print_headline: France Eyes U.S. Tech Giants for Tax Gains

docs.abstract: Researchers in Japan and at the University of Michigan said they have found a way to take over the voice-controlled digital assistants.
docs.snippet: Researchers in Japan and at the University of Michigan said they have found a way to take over the voice-controlled digital assistants.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Since voice-controlled digital assistants were introduced a few years ago, security experts have fretted that systems like Apple’s Siri and Amazon’s Alexa were a privacy threat and could be easily hacked.

headline.main: With a Laser, Researchers Say They Can Hack Alexa, Google Home or Siri
headline.print_headline: Hacking Alexa With a Beam of Light

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)

docs.abstract: Bloomberg says Chinese spy chips were placed in equipment used by Apple and Amazon. The companies involved flatly deny it. Either way, the story raises important questions.
docs.snippet: Bloomberg says Chinese spy chips were placed in equipment used by Apple and Amazon. The companies involved flatly deny it. Either way, the story raises important questions.
docs.lead_paragraph: Good Friday. Want this by email Sign up here.

headline.main: DealBook Briefing: The Big Problem at the Heart of Tech’s Latest Spy Scandal

docs.abstract: After two years of bitter patent battles across three continents, Apple and the chip maker Qualcomm have settled all of their disputes.
docs.snippet: After two years of bitter patent battles across three continents, Apple and the chip maker Qualcomm have settled all of their disputes.

docs.abstract: Lawmakers had strong questions and criticism for tech giants yesterday during three hearings on Capitol Hill. Here’s what happened.
docs.snippet: Lawmakers had strong questions and criticism for tech giants yesterday during three hearings on Capitol Hill. Here’s what happened.
docs.lead_paragraph: Good Wednesday. The Elon Musk-backed company Neuralink unveiled its plans to wire your brain to the internet last night — more on that below. (Want this by email? Sign up here.)

headline.main: DealBook Briefing: Big Tech’s Tough Day in D.C.
